name: part_005
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・昼公演】AZKi Major Debut LiVE「声音エントロピー」【#AZKiワンマン #AZKiワンマン横浜昼】 [2ZvJOnftaSI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Preview of the song 'Lazy' from the album 'Route If'.
Album information and tracklist for 'Route If' are displayed.
Preview of the song 'Chaotic inner world'.
Preview of the song 'Akeminaigoru ga attaranara'.
Preview of the song 'After 8 PM Chorus Song'.
Preview of the song 'Yoru no kakehashi'.
Preview of the song 'Map in the Cup'.
Extended teaser section featuring longer clips of various songs from 'Route If'.

subtitles.original: いつか一緒に
subtitles.english: Together someday

subtitles.original: そう、特等席じゃなくても
subtitles.english: Yeah, even if it's not a special seat

subtitles.original: 君と歌えるのならば
subtitles.english: If I can sing with you

subtitles.original: Na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na...

subtitles.original: 何も見えない空 よく似て
subtitles.english: Much like the sky where nothing can be seen

subtitles.original: ひどい顔で 撒き散らせる
subtitles.english: With a terrible face, I can scatter it around

subtitles.original: 朝から世界で笑って
subtitles.english: Smiling at the world since morning

subtitles.original: 誰も知らず 僕を壊す
subtitles.english: Breaking me without anyone knowing

subtitles.original: 必死にしても 守れない約束
subtitles.english: A promise that cannot be kept even with desperation

subtitles.original: 君に分かったんで
subtitles.english: Since you understood it

subtitles.original: もしもばかり 呟いてしまう
subtitles.english: I keep muttering only "what ifs"

subtitles.original: 笑い疲れた 消えちゃいそうで痛いな
subtitles.english: Tired of laughing, it hurts like I'm about to disappear

subtitles.original: それでも無駄な小さい優しさ 止めてないよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I haven't stopped those useless small kindnesses

subtitles.original: 忘れられないように 大人ぶって履いた
subtitles.english: So as not to be forgotten, I put them on acting like an adult

subtitles.original: 嘘が 動き出して
subtitles.english: Lies started moving

subtitles.original: 僕を 涙さえも
subtitles.english: And even my tears

subtitles.original: 許されなくて 眠れない
subtitles.english: Not being forgiven, I can't sleep

subtitles.original: 要らない心 重くかさばり動けない
subtitles.english: The unneeded heart is heavy and bulky, I can't move

subtitles.original: 深くなる夜 僕と待ち合わせをした
subtitles.english: The night deepens, I made a rendezvous with myself

subtitles.original: 上手く拭えない昨日 押し付けてまた回り
subtitles.english: Pushing away the yesterday that can't be wiped well, it spins again

subtitles.original: こんなんでごめん 諦めてないから 辛くて
subtitles.english: Sorry for being like this, because I haven't given up, it's painful

subtitles.original: 諦めてないから 嫌ってく
subtitles.english: Because I haven't given up, I'll come to hate it

subtitles.original: 正しさも分からず 手を引いて
subtitles.english: Not knowing what's right, pulling the hand

subtitles.original: 誰も知らず 僕を壊す
subtitles.english: Breaking me without anyone knowing

subtitles.original: 特別じゃない ただ普通でよかった
subtitles.english: It's not special, just being ordinary was enough

subtitles.original: 褒めてあげてたら
subtitles.english: If I had praised you

subtitles.original: 長く伸びた 前髪も好きになれた
subtitles.english: I could have come to like my long bangs too

subtitles.original: 笑い疲れた 消えちゃいそうで痛いな
subtitles.english: Tired of laughing, it hurts like I'm about to disappear

subtitles.original: それでも無駄な小さい優しさ 止めてないよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I haven't stopped those useless small kindnesses

subtitles.original: 忘れられないように 大人ぶって履いた 嘘が苦しい
subtitles.english: So as not to be forgotten, the lies I told acting like an adult are painful

subtitles.original: 夢ねだりたい 楽しそうでいな 甘えれていな
subtitles.english: I want to beg for a dream, look happy, be able to depend

subtitles.original: なれない言葉を 拾いながら
subtitles.english: While picking up words I'm not used to

subtitles.original: 明日へと並べ 当たり前じゃない朝が
subtitles.english: Lining them up toward tomorrow, the morning that isn't ordinary

subtitles.original: 動き出して 僕を推した
subtitles.english: Started moving and pushed me

subtitles.original: 涙さえも 許されなくて
subtitles.english: Not even my tears are forgiven

subtitles.original: 眠れない
subtitles.english: I can't sleep
